description:
Cinnamon teaches us about hourougan, a portable ration used by soldiers in the Warring States era.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Demon-Hunting! Golf!! Old Dude Activities of Fire!!
Takagari! Golf! Honoo no Ossan Gyouji!!
صيد الشيطان! غوليف! نشاطات العجوز النارية!!
鷹狩り! ゴルフ!! 炎のオッサン行事!!
